key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the main window of the application should open maximized or not

key.name: vertical-layout
key.description: whether the panes are horizontal or vertical

key.name: auto-translate
key.description: Represents whether the application should automatically translate text or not

key.name: source-language
key.description: Represents a language code. "idk" is to autodetect, and "system" for the system language.

key.name: target-language
key.description: Represents a language code. "system" for the system language.

key.name: context
key.description: Passed as context parameter to the DeepL API

key.name: formality
key.description: For supported languages, how format the output should be

key.name: current-usage
key.description: How many characters have been translated

key.name: max-usage
key.description: How many characters can be translated
